biotools.summary: Rephine.r is a pipeline for correcting gene calls and clusters to improve phage pangenomes and phylogenies. Rephine.r is a command-line R script designed to identify common errors in gene clustering that can arise when building phage pangenomes. These include errors due to distant homologs being separated into multiple gene clusters, or fragmented genes being misidentified as multi-copy genes. Correcting these errors will often make it possible to identify new single-copy core genes that can be used downstream to build phylogenies.
